items/other/materials/ore_copper/descrip: Found in the upper levels of the Mines, this ore can be refined into ingots for use in crafting recipes.
items/other/materials/ore_diamond/descri: A rare and beautiful gem. Can be sold, gifted, or used in high level crafting recipes.
items/other/materials/ore_emerald/descri: A shining green gem. Can be sold, gifted, or used in certain crafting recipes.
items/other/materials/ore_gold/descripti: A chunk of gold ore. Can be refined into ingots for crafting.
items/other/materials/ore_iron/descripti: A chunk of iron ore. Can be refined into ingots for crafting.
items/other/materials/ore_mistril/descri: A chunk of mistril ore. Can be refined into ingots for crafting.
items/other/materials/ore_pink_diamond/d: A rare pink colored diamond. Can be sold, gifted, or used in high level crafting recipes.
items/other/materials/ore_ruby/descripti: A sparkling red gem. Can be sold, gifted, or used in certain crafting recipes.
items/other/materials/ore_sapphire/descr: A lustrous blue gem. Can be sold, gifted, or used in certain crafting recipes.
items/other/materials/ore_silver/descrip: A chunk of silver ore. Can be refined into ingots for crafting.
items/other/materials/ore_stone/descript: A piece of stone. Essential for many crafting recipes.
